root.name: Spy vs. Spy
root.description: OverviewSpy vs. Spy was released for the Game Boy in September 1992 by Kemco and First Star Software, Inc. The game, known as Tengoku Trappers: Spy vs. Spy in Japan, is an action game starring the titular spies. The goal is to steal the opposing spy's secret documents, as well as best the opposing spy in combat. Spy vs. Spy is a side-scrolling action game, where the majority of levels center around avoiding the enemy spy, as combat is more often deadly to the player.
